## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b6020e884c60fff5a2625f916a88b898bbe33281dec408fbcfedaac9f6948264)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'nativescript-gainsight-px' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
